about_the_game:
Music created for and used in Castle In The Clouds.

Available in FLAC and MP3 320 kbps formats.

content_descriptors.notes:
ontains depictions of graphic sex, in pixel art form. Monsters in the game are capable of non consensual sex with the female, player-controlled protagonist.

Themes in this game include:> Risque outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations
> Full female and male nudity
> Strong language
> Fantasy sexual situations with exaggerated characters
> Various non-vanilla encounters and non-consensual sex featuring humans and monsters
> Mild violence

Available in FLAC and MP3 320 kbps formats.

short_description: The ost for the steam version of Castle In The Clouds. Made by the Critical Bliss sound team with g3ntlebreeze as the lead composer.
